definition: Beichuan county level city in Mianyang prefecture 綿陽|绵阳, Sichuan
north/(classical) to be defeated
abbr. for Sichuan Province 四川[Si4 chuan1] in southwest China
river/creek/plain/an area of level country
Beichuan Qiang autonomous county in Mianyang 綿陽|绵阳[Mian2 yang2], north Sichuan
Beichuan Qiang autonomous county in Mianyang 綿陽|绵阳[Mian2 yang2], north Sichuan
pinyin: Bei3 chuan1 Qiang1 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4

sentences.english: His team pulled 10 bodies out of Beichuan'shigh school Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 日本救援隊週日在北川中學挖掘出10具屍體。

sentences.english: Strange BedfellowsSurvivors carry salvaged mattresses near earthquake-ravaged Beichuan County in China's Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 地震的倖存者扛着救災牀墊走在北川縣城外。

sentences.english: The quake-hit county will be preserved and serve as a base for earthquake education in the future.
sentences.chinese: 現北川縣城可能保留現狀，作爲地震教育基地。

sentences.english: Prior to this, Kitagawa has been the county seat around the barbed wire fence.
sentences.chinese: 在此之前，一直是北川縣城周圍的鐵絲網。

sentences.english: Survivors carry salvaged mattresses near earthquake-ravaged Beichuan County in China's Sichuan province.
sentences.chinese: 地震的倖存者扛着救災牀墊走在北川縣城外。

sentences.english: The aim of the army is the Tangjiashan quake lake located at the upper reaches of the Beichuan County.
sentences.chinese: 部隊的目標，是位於北川縣城上游的唐家山堰塞湖。

sentences.english: Beichuan was once a town of 22, 000.
sentences.chinese: 北川曾經是一個有22000人口的小縣城。

sentences.english: In Bei Chuan County , emergency communications vehicles are still used to maintain communication with the outside.
sentences.chinese: 北川縣仍利用應急通信車繼續保持對外通信聯絡。

sentences.english: One woman who'd fled from Beichuan left family members behind.
sentences.chinese: 我們遇睹一名從北川逃出去失去親人的婦女。

sentences.english: In Beichuan county, the traffic department has temporarily closed roads.
sentences.chinese: 在北川縣，交通部門已暫時封閉道路。

sentences.english: The new Beichuan county town is finally complete after two year's construction.
sentences.chinese: 經過兩年時間，北川新縣城的建設終於完工。

sentences.english: Mr. Feng was not the first Beichuan official to commit suicide.
sentences.chinese: 馮先生並非第一個自殺身亡的北川官員。

sentences.english: Beichuan Middle School is located in the mountains about 500 meters from the county seat.
sentences.chinese: 北川中學建在距離縣城500米外的山裏。

sentences.english: Two thirds of the Qiang ethnic population in Beichuan died in the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 北川縣三分之二的姜族居民在地震中喪生。

sentences.english: At least 1,000 students and teachers were dead or missing when the main building of Beichuan Middle School in Mianyang City collapsed.
sentences.chinese: 綿陽市北川中學主樓倒塌，至少一千名師生死亡失蹤。
